take-evasive-action.author: Fantasy Flight Games
take-evasive-action.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
take-evasive-action.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
take-evasive-action.name: Take Evasive Action!
take-evasive-action.ability: At the start of the Ship Phase, you may discard this card or spend a :nav: token. If you do, until the end of the round, each friendly ship may increase the last yaw value of its current speed by 1 during its Determine Course step.
